entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cluster-toolkit
entry.content: Cluster Toolkit is an open-source software offered by Google Cloud which makes it easy for customers to deploy AI/ML and HPC environments on Google Cloud.

entry.title: https://github.com/chef/bento
entry.content: Packer templates for building minimal Vagrant baseboxes for multiple platforms

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudtrail-s3-bucket
entry.content: S3 bucket with built in IAM policy to allow CloudTrail logs

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
entry.content: Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-config
entry.content: This module configures AWS Config, a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-documentdb-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a DocumentDB cluster on AWS

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ec2-autoscale-group
entry.content: Terraform module to provision Auto Scaling Group and Launch Template on AWS

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-alb-service-task
entry.content: Terraform module which implements an ECS service which exposes a web service via ALB.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sns-lambda-notify-slack
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a lambda function that subscribes to SNS and notifies to Slack.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sns-topic
entry.content: Terraform Module to Provide an Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sso
entry.content: Terraform module to configure AWS Single Sign-On (SSO)

entry.title: https://github.com/kubernetes/k8s.io
entry.content: Code and configuration to manage Kubernetes project infrastructure, including various *.k8s.io sites
